lead_paragraph: South Africa have called up versatile forward Willem Alberts as a replacement for injured lock Lood de Jager ahead of their Rugby Championship clash with New Zealand on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Boks Call on Alberts for Injured De Jager
headline.main: Boks Call on Alberts for Injured De Jager

snippet: South Africa have called up versatile forward Willem Alberts as a replacement for injured lock Lood de Jager ahead of their Rugby Championship clash with New Zealand on Saturday....
